text: Gary Hannam (born 1951 in Whangarei) is a New Zealand film producer.NZ On Screen.com He co-produced The World's Fastest Indian among other films.Scoop Independent News He has also played a role in the Olivado Limited Avocado oil company and served as its Chief executive officer."Battle for control jolts Olivado" by Maria Slade in the 4:00 AM Thursday July 16, 2009 "New Zealand Herald". Retrieved 5 June, 2015IPSNews.com == References == Category:New Zealand chief executives Category:New Zealand film producers Category:People from Whangārei Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Gary Hannam
